death.attack.coreTouch: %1$s reached the center of the world
death.attack.coreTouch.player: %1$s was pushed into the core by %2$s
deathScreen.frontiers.consumedTotem: Totem of Avarice consumed and inventory kept.
advancements.frontiers.root.title: Frontiers
advancements.frontiers.loot_tower.title: Breaking the Tower
advancements.frontiers.loot_tower.descri: Reach the loot room of the mysterious White Tower
advancements.frontiers.smelt_frostite.de: Smelt a Frostite Ingot at the end of a tedious extraction process
advancements.frontiers.eat_hpapple.title: An Apple a Day
advancements.adventure.kill_warden.title: Defiance
advancements.adventure.kill_warden.descr: Despite all odds, kill a Warden
advancements.husbandry.get_violet_rose.d: Obtain a Violet Rose. Is it technically a violet?
advancements.husbandry.find_truffle.desc: Obtain a Truffle from a Sniffer
advancements.husbandry.feed_truffle_to_h: Feed a Truffle to a Hoglin, making it immune to zombification
advancements.nether.brew_lightning.title: Literal Metaphors
block.frontiers.strange_core.incorrect_f: ...maybe try the Nether equivalents of these blocks?
block.frontiers.strange_core.not_overwor: This cannot be activated in this dimension.
item.frontiers.raw_cobalt.tip: Can be smelted in a furnace to create a cobalt ingot.
item.frontiers.brimtan_ingot.tip: A hot-to-the-touch ingot which can be used to craft tools made from this material. Created by smelting ore in a furnace.
item.frontiers.raw_frostite.tip: Obtained from melted frostite ore. Can be smelted in a furnace to create a frostite ingot.
item.frontiers.frostite_ingot.tip: A freezing-cold ingot obtained through a tedious process. Created by smelting ore in a furnace.
item.frontiers.cursed_tablet.tip: Used to craft a Curse Altar, or can be used with a Curse Altar to remove all curse enchantments on a single item.
item.frontiers.obsidian_casing.tip: Crafted with Obsidian and Diamonds. Can be used to upgrade Golden tools in a Smithing Table.
item.frontiers.cobalt_fishing_rod.tip: Used to catch a wider variety of fish and items.
item.frontiers.obsidian_upgrade_smithing: Can be combined with Golden tools and an Obsidian Casing to give the gear an Obsidian tip.
item.frontiers.heart_of_the_warden.tip: Dropped by the Warden. Using it on a Sculk Catalyst allows for the collection of a very exotic ore.
item.frontiers.shulker_residue.tip: Collected by smashing a Shulker's bullet. Can be used to make potions, bricks and other goods.
item.frontiers.withered_essence.tip: Dropped by the Wither, used in crafting a variety of useful items.
item.frontiers.onyx_bone.tip: Collected by killing a Wither skeleton. Can be used to craft necro weave
item.frontiers.necro_weave.tip: Crafted from Onyx Bones and Wool. Can be crafted into armor.
item.frontiers.ancient_rose_seed.tip: Grows into an Ancient Rose and is obtained by letting a Sniffer sniff it out of the ground.
item.frontiers.ectoplasm.tip: Dropped by Ghasts when they die. Mainly used to craft Mourning gold ingots.
item.frontiers.mourning_gold_ingot.tip: Crafted with Gold Ingots, Ectoplasm and Quartz. Can be used to make unique tools.
item.frontiers.marshmallow.tip: Can be consumed quickly. Restores 0.5 §f🍖§r, or can be cooked on a campfire (or furnace, if you hate fun).
item.frontiers.roasted_marshmallow.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r. Can be eaten more quickly than most other foods.
item.frontiers.invoke_shard.tip: A magical shard that can be crafted into Totems of Undying & other powerful items.
item.frontiers.nacre_brick.tip: Baked from Shulker residue in a furnace.
item.frontiers.levi_roll.tip: Restores 1.5 §f🍖§r. Eating this can cause you to momentarily levitate.
item.frontiers.truffle.tip: A very rare mushroom obtained by letting a Sniffer sniff it out of Mycelium. Can also pacify Hoglins, preventing them from becoming Zoglins.
item.frontiers.apple_of_enlightenment.ti: An extremely rare food item. Permanently adds 2 §f💖§r to your maximum health when first eaten, changing your health's appearance (§f💗§r).
item.frontiers.lightning_in_a_bottle.tip: Created when lightning strikes a brewing stand with an attached lightning rod, as long as it contains glass bottles. Can be thrown or used in crafting.
item.frontiers.purified_end_crystal.tip: A variant of the End Crystal that can be used to further power up Enchanting Tables. Does not explode when hit, instead dropping itself.
item.frontiers.end_crystal_shard.tip: Dropped by destroyed End Crystals. Can be used in crafting.
item.frontiers.raw_verdinite.tip: Can be smelted in a furnace to create a verdinite ingot.
item.frontiers.tablet_fragment.tip: Can be used to craft a Cursed Tablet.
item.frontiers.tome_of_fangs.tip: A book that summons a line of Evoker Fangs in the direction you're facing. Using it at your feet summons a circle of fangs instead.
item.frontiers.ravager_tooth.tip: Dropped by Ravagers. Can be used in crafting.
item.frontiers.incense.tip: The pure essence of anger, dropped by Vexes. Can be used in crafting.
item.frontiers.onyx_meal.tip: Used to instantly grow Nether Wart and Warped Wart, and will destroy nearby grasses when used on Grass Blocks. Can be used to craft Black Dye.
item.frontiers.void_pearl.tip: Consumed on use, allowing access to a secure personal storage. Can be used to craft an Ender Chest.
item.frontiers.plate_helmet.tip: Gives the user 1.5 §f👘§r when worn, and provides powerful knockback resistance.
item.frontiers.plate_chestplate.tip: Gives the user 4 §f👘§r when worn, and provides powerful knockback resistance.
item.frontiers.unfinished_core.tip: Found in Bastion Remnants. Must be combined with 4 unique Core Plates to make a Reactive Core.
item.frontiers.reactive_core.tip: Crafted from an Unfinished Core and the 4 unique Core Plates. Used to craft a Strange Core.
item.frontiers.depths_core_plate.tip: A Core Plate made from rare ores. Used in crafting a Reactive Core.
item.frontiers.frontal_core_plate.tip: A Core Plate made from exotic ores. Used in crafting a Reactive Core.
item.frontiers.everseed.tip: Found in Jungle Temples. Grows into an Evertree.
item.frontiers.pitch_ingot.tip: A strange ingot which can be used to craft tools made from this material. Created by smelting ore in a furnace.
item.frontiers.verdinite_bow.tip: A stronger version of a wooden Bow.
item.frontiers.glowing_upgrade_smithing_: Can be combined with Golden equipment and a Glowing Casing to give the gear a Glowing Obsidian tip.
item.frontiers.tower_key_fragment.tip: Can be used to craft a Tower Key.
item.frontiers.guardian_slice.tip: Restores 1.5 §f🍖§r. Removes Mining Fatigue on consumption.
item.frontiers.elder_guardian_slice.tip: Restores 2 §f🍖§r. Removes Mining Fatigue on consumption.
item.frontiers.cooked_guardian_slice.tip: Restores 3 §f🍖§r. Removes Mining Fatigue on consumption.
item.frontiers.cooked_elder_guardian_sli: Restores 4 §f🍖§r. Removes Mining Fatigue on consumption.
item.frontiers.tower_key.tip: Can be used at a Tower Vault to unlock it.
item.frontiers.warped_wart.tip: Used in advanced potion brewing. This can be found naturally growing in Bastion Remnants. It can also be planted on Soul Sand.
item.frontiers.raw_vivulite.tip: Can be smelted in a furnace to create a vivulite ingot.
item.frontiers.pale_prismarine_shard.tip: Dropped by Elder Guardians. Can be used in crafting alternate colors of Prismarine blocks.
item.frontiers.totem_of_avarice.tip: Dying with this in your inventory will allow you to keep your items. Consumed on use.
block.frontiers.cobalt_ore.tip: Can be mined with a Netherite pickaxe or better once the Wither has been defeated, otherwise it disintegrates. Can be smelted in a furnace to produce cobalt ingots.
block.frontiers.cobalt_block.tip: A compact way of storing Cobalt.
block.frontiers.deepslate_cobalt_ore.tip: Can be mined with a Netherite pickaxe or better once the Wither has been defeated, otherwise it disintegrates. Can be smelted in a furnace to produce cobalt ingots.
block.frontiers.frostite_ore.tip: Can be mined with a cobalt pickaxe or better - but only when enchanted with Silk Touch. Must be melted by a light source to collect the raw frostite within.
block.frontiers.glowing_obsidian.tip: A special glowing variant of Obsidian obtained when a Strange Core converts Obsidian. Creates a Crags portal in the Nether, or can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.strange_core.tip: A core with the ability to terraform its surroundings. Part of a structure - 5 blackstone in a plus shape, 4 Mourning Gold blocks in the corners of the plus, 4 blackstone above those, the core in the center, then another blackstone plus on top.
block.frontiers.ancient_rose.tip: An ultra-rare blue flower, grown when an Ancient Rose Seed is planted. Can be used as decoration or to craft a bush.
block.frontiers.ancient_rose_bush.tip: A tall blue flower crafted from 4 Ancient Roses and a Rose Bush.
block.frontiers.rose.tip: A rare red flower obtained by shearing Rose Bushes. Can be used to craft red dye.
block.frontiers.violet_rose.tip: A violet flower, grown when bonemealing a Rose or Ancient Rose nearby one another. Can be used as decoration or to craft a bush.
block.frontiers.violet_rose_bush.tip: A tall purple flower crafted from 4 Violet Roses and a Rose Bush.
block.frontiers.mourning_gold_block.tip: A compact way of storing Mourning Gold.
block.frontiers.tower_bricks.tip: An extremely strong wall found in the mysterious tower.
block.frontiers.mossy_tower_bricks.tip: An extremely strong wall found in the mysterious tower.
block.frontiers.nacre_bricks.tip: Baked from Shulker residue in a furnace.
block.frontiers.nacre_brick_wall.tip: A wall made of Nacre Bricks.
block.frontiers.snow_dahlia.tip: A rare icy flower that can be used to craft light blue dye.
block.frontiers.fungal_daffodil.tip: An uncommon purple fungus that can be used to craft purple dye. Only grows on Mycelium.
block.frontiers.crimcone.tip: A rare red flower from the Nether that can be used to craft red dye. Only grows on Crimson Nylium.
block.frontiers.cragulstane.tip: A strong, warped stone that generates in the Crags. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.cragulstane_bricks.tip: Crafted from Cragulstane. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.cragulstane_brick_wall.t: A wall made of Cragulstane Bricks.
block.frontiers.chiseled_cragulstane_bri: Crafted from Cragulstane Brick Slabs. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.aesthenostone.tip: The literal core of the world. Cannot be broken, and inflicts extreme damage when stood on.
block.frontiers.onyx_bone_block.tip: Crafted from Onyx Bone Meal, or found in the Nether in fossils. Can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.evertree.tip: Enhances production of a chosen crop within a large area.
block.frontiers.small_corrupted_amethyst: Will grow into a Medium Corrupted Amethyst Bud. Can also be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.medium_corrupted_amethys: Will grow into a Large Corrupted Amethyst Bud. Can also be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.large_corrupted_amethyst: Will grow into a Corrupted Amethyst Cluster that can be mined for End Crystal Shards. Can also be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.corrupted_amethyst_clust: Can be mined for End Crystal Shards or used as decoration.
block.frontiers.quicksand.tip: Slows your movement on contact. Being submerged in it will suffocate you.
block.frontiers.red_quicksand.tip: Slows your movement on contact. Being submerged in it will suffocate you.
block.frontiers.blue_nether_bricks.tip: Crafted from Warped Wart and Nether Brick. Can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.blue_nether_brick_wall.t: A wall made of Blue Nether Bricks.
block.frontiers.purple_nether_bricks.tip: Crafted from both kinds of Wart and Nether Brick. Can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.purple_nether_brick_wall: A wall made of Purple Nether Bricks.
block.frontiers.cracked_blue_nether_bric: Created by smelting Blue Nether Bricks in a furnace. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.chiseled_blue_nether_bri: Crafted with Blue Nether Brick Slabs. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.cracked_purple_nether_br: Created by smelting Purple Nether Bricks in a furnace. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.chiseled_purple_nether_b: Crafted with Purple Nether Brick Slabs. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.cracked_red_nether_brick: Created by smelting Red Nether Bricks in a furnace. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.chiseled_red_nether_bric: Crafted with Red Nether Brick Slabs. Can be used for construction.
block.frontiers.lumen.tip: Emits different levels of light based on the power provided.
block.frontiers.redstone_lumen.tip: Emits different levels of light based on the power provided. Emits much weaker light than most lumens.
block.frontiers.echo_lumen.tip: Emits different levels of light based on the power provided. Emits much weaker light than most lumens.
block.frontiers.verdinite_ore.tip: Can be mined with a cobalt pickaxe or better, then smelted in a furnace to produce verdinite ingots.
block.frontiers.verdinite_block.tip: A compact way of storing Verdinite.
Can be mined with a cobalt pickaxe or better, then smelted in a furnace to produce verdinite ingots.
block.frontiers.vivulite_ore.tip: Can be mined with a verdinite pickaxe or better, then smelted in a furnace to produce vivulite ingots.
block.frontiers.vivulite_block.tip: A compact way of storing Vivulite.
block.frontiers.deepslate_vivulite_ore.t: Can be mined with a verdinite pickaxe or better, then smelted in a furnace to produce vivulite ingots.
block.frontiers.pale_prismarine.tip: A rare variant of Prismarine crafted using Prismarine and a Pale Prismarine Shard.
block.frontiers.pale_prismarine_bricks.t: A rare variant of Prismarine Bricks crafted using Prismarine Bricks and a Pale Prismarine Shard.
block.frontiers.deep_pale_prismarine.tip: A rare variant of Dark Prismarine crafted using Dark Prismarine and a Pale Prismarine Shard.
block.frontiers.frostite_block.tip: A compact way of storing Frostite.
block.frontiers.turtle_scute_bricks.tip: Crafted from Brick and Turtle Scutes. Can be used for decoration.
A wall made of Turtle Scute Bricks.
block.frontiers.pale_prismarine_wall.tip: A wall made of Pale Prismarine.
block.frontiers.sea_glass.tip: A semi-transparent block that emits low light and lets light through. Can be crafted from a Glass Block and Prismarine Crystals.
block.frontiers.pale_sea_glass.tip: A rare variant of Sea Glass crafted using Sea Glass and a Pale Prismarine Shard.
block.frontiers.sea_glass_pane.tip: Can be used as an alternative to Sea Glass.
block.frontiers.pale_sea_glass_pane.tip: Can be used as an alternative to Pale Sea Glass.
block.frontiers.creeper_model.tip: A taxidermized Creeper. Can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.skeleton_model.tip: A taxidermized Skeleton. Can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.stray_model.tip: A taxidermized Stray. Can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.bogged_model.tip: A taxidermized Bogged. Can be used as decoration.
block.frontiers.blaze_model.tip: A taxidermized Blaze. Can be used as decoration.
item.minecraft.override_end_crystal.tip: Heals the Ender Dragon, and can be used to respawn it. Can take three hits before exploding. Placing one near Budding Amethyst will alter what it produces.
item.minecraft.override_prismarine_shard: Dropped by Guardians. Can be used in crafting Prismarine and Sea Lanterns, or repairing Tridents on an Anvil.
